cards.name: Ajani Vengeant
cards.text:
+1: Target permanent doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.
−2: Ajani Vengeant deals 3 damage to target creature or player and you gain 3 life.
−7: Destroy all lands target player controls.

cards.name: Ancient Hellkite
cards.text:
Flying
{R}: Ancient Hellkite deals 1 damage to target creature defending player controls. Activate this ability only if Ancient Hellkite is attacking.
cards.flavor: When a dragon attacks, there are no bystanders.

cards.name: Ant Queen
cards.text: {1}{G}: Put a 1/1 green Insect creature token onto the battlefield.
cards.flavor:
"Kill the queen first, or we'll be fighting her drones forever. It is not in a queen's nature to have enough servants."
—Borzard, exterminator captain

cards.name: Bident of Thassa
cards.text:
Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card.
{1}{U}, {T}: Creatures your opponents control attack this turn if able.
cards.flavor: The wills of mortals shift as the tide ebbs and flows.

cards.name: Breaking
cards.text:
Target player puts the top eight cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.
Fuse (You may cast one or both halves of this card from your hand.)

cards.name: Colossal Whale
cards.text:
Islandwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)
Whenever Colossal Whale attacks, you may exile target creature defending player controls until Colossal Whale leaves the battlefield. (That creature returns under its owner's control.)

cards.name: Deadbridge Goliath
cards.text: Scavenge {4}{G}{G} ({4}{G}{G}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Put a number of +1/+1 counters equal to this card's power on target creature. Scavenge only as a sorcery.)
cards.flavor: Some Golgari insects live for centuries—and they never stop growing.

cards.name: Dictate of the Twin Gods
cards.text:
Flash
If a source would deal damage to a permanent or player, it deals double that damage to that permanent or player instead.
cards.flavor: Iroas and Mogis are as different in appearance as they are in personality.

cards.name: Dragon Throne of Tarkir
cards.text:
Equipped creature has defender and "{2}, {T}: Other creatures you control gain trample and get +X/+X until end of turn, where X is this creature's power."
Equip {3}
cards.flavor: What once soared high above Tarkir is now reduced to a seat.

cards.name: Earwig Squad
cards.text:
Prowl {2}{B} (You may cast this for its prowl cost if you dealt combat damage to a player this turn with a Goblin or Rogue.)
When Earwig Squad enters the battlefield, if its prowl cost was paid, search target opponent's library for three cards and exile them. Then that player shuffles his or her library.

cards.name: Entering
cards.text:
Put a creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. It gains haste until end of turn.
Fuse (You may cast one or both halves of this card from your hand.)

cards.name: Figure of Destiny
cards.text:
{R/W}: Figure of Destiny becomes a Kithkin Spirit with base power and toughness 2/2.
{R/W}{R/W}{R/W}: If Figure of Destiny is a Spirit, it becomes a Kithkin Spirit Warrior with base power and toughness 4/4.
{R/W}{R/W}{R/W}{R/W}{R/W}{R/W}: If Figure of Destiny is a Warrior, it becomes a Kithkin Spirit Warrior Avatar with base power and toughness 8/8, flying, and first strike.

cards.name: Garruk's Horde
cards.text:
Trample
Play with the top card of your library revealed.
You may cast the top card of your library if it's a creature card. (Do this only any time you could cast that creature card. You still pay the spell's costs.)

cards.name: In Garruk's Wake
cards.text: Destroy all creatures you don't control and all planeswalkers you don't control.
cards.flavor: Beyond pain, beyond obsession and wild despair, there lies a place of twisted power only the most tormented souls can reach.

cards.name: Joraga Warcaller
cards.text:
Multikicker {1}{G} (You may pay an additional {1}{G} any number of times as you cast this spell.)
Joraga Warcaller enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each time it was kicked.
Other Elf creatures you control get +1/+1 for each +1/+1 counter on Joraga Warcaller.

cards.name: Knight of New Alara
cards.text: Each other multicolored creature you control gets +1/+1 for each of its colors.
cards.flavor: "I embrace all of Alara, Grixis as much as Bant. Let my former home call me traitor. I do this not for accolades, but because it is right."

cards.name: Lord of Shatterskull Pass
cards.text:
Level up {1}{R} ({1}{R}: Put a level counter on this. Level up only as a sorcery.)
LEVEL 1-5
6/6
LEVEL 6+
6/6
Whenever Lord of Shatterskull Pass attacks, it deals 6 damage to each creature defending player controls.

cards.name: Ludevic's Abomination
cards.text: Trample
cards.flavor: After several frustrating experiments, the visionary Ludevic realized he needed to create a monster that fed on torch-wielding mobs.

cards.name: Ludevic's Test Subject
cards.text:
Defender
{1}{U}: Put a hatchling counter on Ludevic's Test Subject. Then if there are five or more hatchling counters on it, remove all of them and transform it.

cards.name: Mondronen Shaman
cards.text: At the beginning of each upkeep, if no spells were cast last turn, transform Mondronen Shaman.
cards.flavor: "Tovolar, my master. Gather the howlpack, for the Hunter's Moon is nigh and Thraben's walls grow weak."

cards.name: Obelisk of Alara
cards.text:
{1}{W}, {T}: You gain 5 life.
{1}{U}, {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.
{1}{B}, {T}: Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn.
{1}{R}, {T}: Obelisk of Alara deals 3 damage to target player.
{1}{G}, {T}: Target creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn.

cards.name: Phyrexian Metamorph
cards.text:
({U/P} can be paid with either {U} or 2 life.)
You may have Phyrexian Metamorph enter the battlefield as a copy of any artifact or creature on the battlefield, except it's an artifact in addition to its other types.

cards.name: Restoration Angel
cards.text:
Flash
Flying
When Restoration Angel enters the battlefield, you may exile target non-Angel creature you control, then return that card to the battlefield under your control.

cards.name: Skarrg Goliath
cards.text:
Trample
Bloodrush — {5}{G}{G}, Discard Skarrg Goliath: Target attacking creature gets +9/+9 and gains trample until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
"They bind us with their laws. We free ourselves with nature's fist."
—Nikya of the Old Ways

cards.name: Staff of Nin
cards.text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, draw a card.
{T}: Staff of Nin deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
cards.flavor:
"I have attuned the staff to your screams so that only I may benefit from your pain."
—Volux, disciple of Nin

cards.name: Steel Hellkite
cards.text:
Flying
{2}: Steel Hellkite gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
{X}: Destroy each nonland permanent with converted mana cost X whose controller was dealt combat damage by Steel Hellkite this turn. Activate this ability only once each turn.

cards.name: Thopter Assembly
cards.text:
Flying
At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control no Thopters other than Thopter Assembly, return Thopter Assembly to its owner's hand and put five 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature tokens with flying onto the battlefield.

cards.name: Tovolar's Magehunter
cards.text:
Whenever an opponent casts a spell, Tovolar's Magehunter deals 2 damage to that player.
At the beginning of each upkeep, if a player cast two or more spells last turn, transform Tovolar's Magehunter.
cards.flavor: "Tovolar, my master. Gather the howlpack, for the Hunter's Moon is nigh and Thraben's walls grow weak."

cards.name: Tromokratis
cards.text:
Tromokratis has hexproof unless it's attacking or blocking.
Tromokratis can't be blocked unless all creatures defending player controls block it. (If any creature that player controls doesn't block this creature, it can't be blocked.)

cards.name: Valakut, the Molten Pinnacle
cards.text:
Valakut, the Molten Pinnacle enters the battlefield tapped.
Whenever a Mountain enters the battlefield under your control, if you control at least five other Mountains, you may have Valakut, the Molten Pinnacle deal 3 damage to target creature or player.
{T}: Add {R} to your mana pool.

cards.name: Vexing Shusher
cards.text:
Vexing Shusher can't be countered.
{R/G}: Target spell can't be countered by spells or abilities.
cards.flavor: The stench of bloodcap mushrooms on the breath is enough to ward off even the most potent magics, especially when combined with a special chant: "Hushhh."
